name: Aditya Narayan Sahoo
text: I was completely blown away by the sheer talent on display.

name: Manjari Ramaswamy
text: I was on the edge of my seat the entire time. I've never seen anything quite like it before. The movie was a true work of art.

name: Indranil Sangha
text: The story was so gripping, I couldn't tear myself away. The movie was an absolute masterpiece. I wish I could give it more than five stars.

name: Damini Das
text: I felt like I was right there with the characters. I was completely enthralled by every moment of it. I couldn't have asked for a better moviegoing experience.
